doc.name: ComplexToCartesian
doc.description: Read a complex token and output double tokens that represent the real and imaginary parts to two different output ports.
doc.author: Michael Leung, Edward A. Lee, Paul Whitaker
doc.port: The port for the input, which has type ComplexToken.
The output port for x coordinate, which has type DoubleToken.
The output port for the imaginary coordinate, which has type DoubleToken.
